ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Charm vs level 12 pet
ygData.msgSnippet: if it s a pet you need, I would suggest sticking with your summoned pet since you know he won t turn on you in the middle of the fight.  Charming I use more
ygData.messageBody:
if it's a pet you need, I would suggest sticking with your summoned pet
since you know he won't turn on you in the middle of the fight. Charming I
use more for crowd control or in a situation where I have someone backing me
up if it breaks at the wrong time.

As for pets and weapons, it really doesn't do them any good (except make
them look cool sometimes :). It used to be that giving you pet a dagger
would increase it's speed without affecting damage, but that is not the case
anymore. Your pet will do the same damage at the same speed no matter what
it wields. Eventually, however, you pet will gain the ability to dual
wield, in which case giving it two weapons will help, but I forget what
level they get it at.

Tinik Gutenungrie
Gnomish Enchanter, Veeshan

-----Original Message-----
From: Rich Hitz [mailto:Rich.Hitz@...]On Behalf Of (Uthanatos)
Sent: Friday, October 06, 2000 12:12 PM
To: '(EQ Enchanters)'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Charm vs level 12 pet


Is it better to use your pet at 12th or to charm? This is for charming a
yellow con to take out another yellow or even.
Will it be resisted to much after first getting it?
How much damage does a level 12 pet do?
I have been giving my pet rusty daggers.
Does this increase attack speed?
Does it influence the amount of damage dealt?

Thanks in advance!

--
Uthanatos
Not-so-rare spawn on Fennin
